name: VehiCraft
description: This is a vehicle sandbox crafting game that you can build different ground vehicles to fight other vehicles. This game gives the maximum freedom for object placement and customisation for your vehicle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Quad Core 3+ ghz CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5-3570K or FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
